features: Our Ribbed Glass Design Vase: This 8 Inch glass vases for decor is made of primary colored translucent lead free glass while ensuring safety, The interior and exterior of this unique vase have vertical and uniform ridges with beautiful textures, The wide mouth and straight design makes it easy to clean, just rinse with clean water. The ribbed glass design plays well with the light & it gives stunning reflections and charm.

Modern & Unique Flower Vase: With Ins-design and hand-blown craftsmanship, each of this cute vases is unique and attractive. The ribbed and fluted groove design on the surface of the vase adds a touch of sophistication and elegance, This small glass vase is a perfect contemporary art decoration for your home, kitchen, dining room, living room, bedroom, office, restaurant, flower shop, vintage & cylinder vase etc.

For Versatile Use: Skillfully This all-round glass vase with the classic cylinder shape makes it a versatile decoration for any space in your home, from the dining table to the bathroom and living room. This Small vases are perfect for displaying fresh or dried flowers, whether it is a big bouquet or a few scattered flowers, both can be well decorated in it, or to simply add a touch of charm to a tabletop or shelf.

The Perfect Gift: While Optimizing the texture and look as a beautiful colored glass vase, it is an ideal gift for Christmas, Thanksgiving, housewarming, holiday, Mother's Day, birthday, wedding, anniversary, or any other special occasion.

90 DAYS HASSLE-FREE RETURN: If you are not completely satisfied within 90 days of your purchase, you can ask for a return or replacement. Regardless of product quality or service, you could contact us in time if you have any questions. We provide 7X24 of hours customer service for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, well-made vase
reviews.reviewText: I love this vase! I bought it to put in the entryway of our apartment, and it looks perfect - exactly like the photo. The vase has a nice weight to it, and is of good quality. The green glass is slightly translucent, but opaque enough to conceal if your flowers are fake or not (which mine are, lol). It's a great little accent piece for any room!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice heavy vase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect vase for Lego flower bouquet
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter got the Lego botanicals floral bouquet kit and needed a vase to go with it - this one is exactly the size, color and sturdiness that she needed, it works perfectly and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This vase is stunning! Absolutely gorgeous! This is great for both fresh flowers and pampas. I plan on using it for pampas. Make sure to grab the long-stem ones as it is a pretty tall vase. Also very wide, so if using it for flowers you will need a pretty large bouquet. The glass isn't thick which I actually really like. If it comes in another color I will definitely grab one for the living room. A must-have for a mid-century modern or luxury look decor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This vase is a statement alone or filled with flowers. Well crafted and sturdy as well.
